QuestData.Title: Helya's Conquest
QuestData.Description:
If Helya is making an advance on the Broken Isles, we will need to answer in turn.
Go to Tideskorn Harbor and scout her forces. We will see if Helya is foolish enough to begin her campaign against me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search Tideskorn Harbor for evidence of Helya's forces.
